name: Gyroscopic Bus: Fire Brigade
description:
Here you will use as passenger bus or as Rescue fire brigade it depend on you whatever you want.
Enjoy a modern technology toady, here we discuss about the latest technology based gyroscopic future bus.
Amazing game with good smooth control and beautiful environment of gyroscopic bus simulator.
Gyro bus have a intend behavior of the passenger pick and drop in the city and also a best rescue emergency fire brigade service.
Everyone install it and enjoy a latest technology based bus simulator.you will really enjoy this game.
